item.title: UnderPass
item.description: INTRODUCTION UnderPass was a nice, quick and cheerful box. A perfect choice if you have limited time but feel the itch to hack something. Kudos to the box creator, @dakkmaddy, for putting together this treat. It was released between Season 6 and 7. Recon was pleasant, and a great reminder to always include some UDP scanning (even if it usually isn’t very useful). It was a mixture of OSINT, Web enumeration, and SNMP.
